Text.val: 15.09.2014 SH SCR19132 Changed length of v.WhereClause from 255 to 500, 255 not long enough if all input parameter are send;
added "optimize for 100 rows for fetch only" to DSQL to increase performance in cas eof big datasets retreived from database;
Calling detail screen now directly via event of button Detail, instead of logic to call the screen from the main parent task
18.09.2013 GB SCR18345 Allowed multiselection for delete action
06.09.2013 GB SCR18345 Rebulid the online task from magic logic to dsql, fixed problem with focus after comeback from the Detail
02.09.2013 GB SCR18392 Displayed 1.7 Financed = MQDT_IDSP_NO, Details: removed SCHI_MARKCODE = GNRL_MARKCODELIMITEXCEEDED
... only if MQDT row still exists, could be deleted by another user and current
user didn't moved the cursor from parked row
... lock not possible because locked by another user or MQDT is already deleted

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_MQTY_ID, MQDT_LINENO, MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO, MQDT_DEBH_NO,MQDT_DEBC_NO, MQDT_INVO_NO, (select cast (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = MQDT_LETTER and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = MQDT_DEBC_NO and INVO_SCHT_NO = MQDT_INVO_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0), (select cast (sum (INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = MQDT_LETTER and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = MQDT_DEBC_NO and INVO_SCHT_NO = MQDT_INVO_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0), MQDT_LETTER, MQDT_DATE, MQDT_TIME, MQDT_ACTIVEUSER from :1/MQDT where :2 order by MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_MQTY_ID, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO, MQDT_DEBH_NO, MQDT_LINENO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

ExpSyntax.val: (ISNULL ({0,26}) OR {0,26}='' OR {0,26}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,8},'M')>0
(ISNULL ({0,26}) OR {0,26}='' OR {0,26}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,8},'M')>0 AND {0,13}>0
